mapper.select: select p.pno, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pcom, p.pphoto from sus_01_info s1 inner join product_info p on s1.pno=p.pno where s1.sno=#{value} order by s1.sno desc
select p.pno, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pcom, p.pphoto from sus_02_info s2 inner join product_info p on s2.pno=p.pno where s2.sno=#{value} order by s2.sno desc
mapper.insert: insert into product_info(pname, pprice, pcom, pphoto, na, car, sug, tFat, sFat, chol, pro) values (#{model}, #{price}, #{company}, #{photo}, #{salt}, #{carbohydrate}, #{sugar}, #{transFat}, #{saturatedFat}, #{cholesterol}, #{protein})
mapper.select: select p.pno, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pcom, p.pphoto, p.na, p.car, p.sug, p.tFat, p.sFat, p.chol, p.pro from product_info p where p.pno = #{value}
mapper.update: update product_info set pname = #{model}, pprice = #{price}, pcom = #{company}, pphoto = #{photo}, na = #{salt}, car = #{carbohydrate}, sug = #{sugar}, tFat = #{transFat}, sFat = #{saturatedFat}, chol = #{cholesterol}, pro = #{protein} where pno = #{no}
